alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL BAYFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN ASHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Bayfield, to Ino, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Washburn around 640 PM CDT. Bayfield and La Pointe around 645 PM CDT. Barksdale around 655 PM CDT. Marengo and Madeline Island around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Big Bay State Park, New Odanah, Moquah, Bad River Reservation and Apostle Islands National Lake Shore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
